TopicTitle: You can change your company flag?

Articles.Content:
Lol, was just trying to click on the astronaut complex and accidentally clicked the flag pole, for the first time ever apparently, and it brought up the flag selection dialog...lol this a completely useless post but just thought I'd share lol, how long has that been in game? Forever? Lol:huh:

I had always changed mine ion the persistent file if I wanted to change it lol.
Yeah, been there for ages. There is a glitch, however. It doesn't always display the flag you want until after you have left (without reverting) the first flight of the current gaming session.

That's pretty much how I discovered that feature. Hit the flagpole entirely by chance. While it's a perfectly sensible way of doing it, it's VERY non-obvious as the flagpole is very small..
And there's the new thing I learned today.
You guys don't read the wiki enough!
